name: test_e2e_with_logs[056_SQLI_UNION_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_004` |
| **Name** | Table name extraction via information_schema |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT table_name,NULL,NULL FROM information_schema.tables --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20table_name%2CNULL%2CNULL%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:28:53.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_UNION_004-1767274133309-kklfewq pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_004 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20table_name%2CNULL%2CNULL%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
